form.official-title: To provide the public with open access to electronic federal court records.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Open Public Access to Court Electronic Records Act of 2013.

section.header: Open access to electronic federal court records

subsection.header: Repeal of court fees for electronic access to information
subsection.text: Section 303 of the Judiciary Appropriations Act, 1992, as amended (28 U.S.C. 1913 note) is hereby repealed.

subsection.header: Requirement for open access to electronic information
subsection.text: Subsection (e) of Section 205 of Public Law 107-347, as amended (44 USC 3501 note) is amended to read:

paragraph.header: Cost of Providing Electronic Docketing Information
paragraph.text: The federal courts shall charge no fee for public access to information or documents described in subsection (a), or for any services provided by the court to the public for searching or indexing such information or documents.

subsection.text: The courts shall comply with subsection (b) not later than the first day of the fiscal year immediately following the enactment of this Act.
